nodes.text: Lupre'en was a language that was spoken in the galaxy. The Lupr'or spoke a variation on Lupre'en which Captain Phasma of the First Order was able to understand. The BB unit BB-K8 once confused the Lupre'en word for "everyone" with "men", causing TN-3465 to tell her local guide Dar'en to bring the men when she meant everyone in the village.
